name: Doktor Golem's Radical Robot
description:
Play as Doktor Golem's newest invention, the radical robot in this fast paced first person platformer. In this demo you will play through the good doktor's first five test courses.

Included in this demo:

  • Running
  • Jumping
  • Sliding
  • Wallrunning
  • Hidden collectibles in every level

In the works:

  • A character model
  • Sound effects and music
  • Light story
  • Many more levels
  • Trampolines
  • Teleporters
  • Boost pads
  • Ziplines
  • And more

This demo is not totally representative of the final product. We're hoping to get some early feedback, so if you play we would greatly appreciate a comment. If you are feeling extra generous, you can participate in one or both of our surveys below:

https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/68HMQJN

https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/68B2XTR
